title.narrative: POLICIES AND STRATEGIES

description.narrative: Strengthened national capacities for political commitment to planning, budgeting and coordination for the scaling up of interventions, which contributes to Nutrition â€“ General, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Pregnant women, nursing mothers, and children under 5 have access and use equitable public and community facilities for the prevention and treatment of malnutrition, including in humanitarian situations

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened national capacities for political commitment to planning, budgeting and coordination for the scaling up ofinterventions

description.narrative: UNICEF, along with other technical and financial partners present in the Comoros, supported the government to implement its 2019-2022 nutrition action plan, through the planning and budgeting of the 2021 operational plans in the islands and at the national level. UNICEF and JICA supported the Department of Family Health to evaluate and update the national protocol for the management of severe acute malnutrition and to train 51 health workers in the use of this new protocol.As part of the nutrition summit held in Tokyo in December 2021, the Comoros presented 4 national commitments to accelerate the national nutrition agenda. | Status:Met | As-of Date:11/01/2022
